div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.h5:
Winfield City Schools will be closed to students for the remainder of the school year. Schools and the Central Office will be open 9am -1 pm Mondays & Thursdays to answer your questions or concerns.
Coronavirus (COVID-19) info from WCS

div.p:
April 1st, 2020
Dear Pirate Family,
As you all know by now, we will not be returning to school on Monday, April 6th or for the remainder of the...

div.p: Alabama ACT Scores for the Class of 2019 were released with Winfield City Schools ranking 12th overall, but English ranked in the Top 10 at #7. Science ranked 11th,...
